topic.title: Logs
topic.shortdesc: The Log tab provides a built-in event log and diagnostics collection section.

body.p: From the main Couchbase Web Console screen select the Log tab. Two sub-tubs are available: Logs and Collect Information.

section.title: Logs
section.p: The Logs tab displays available logs by the Event, Module Code, Server Node, and Time. It enables you to identify activity and errors within the Couchbase cluster.

section.title: Collect Information
section.p: The Collection Information tab enables you to collect logs and diagnostic information from either all nodes or selected nodes in a cluster. You can also upload the collected logs directly to Couchbase Support with your data (customer name, ticket number) for easy tracking.
